Title: The 4-Hour Workweek
Author: Tim Ferriss
ShortReview:
Certainly not for everyone, this books will must probably either be loved or hated.
This is one of the first "self-development" book I've read, but clearly the most important one. It's not the books I've most acted upon but it changed my vision on life entirely (even though it took time).
Tim Ferriss has a fun writing in my opinion, but mostly wrote a very clear step by step guide into a new way of living your life.

Title: Anything You Want
Author: Derek Sivers
ShortReview:
Anything you want is a very odd kind of book. you can't say it's self development or "how to" for business. Derek Sivers, as most often, only relates his story, without ever saying what you hsould or shouldn't do.
The book is short, funny and to the point.
It provides a different way of viewing how business are built and run.
What you will learn and retain from this book is entirely dependant on yourself.
